strapiPost.title: Art Walk Becomes Art 'Dance' In Downtown Rogers Tonight
strapiPost.content:
The Art on the Bricks Art Walk in downtown Rogers returns tonight and the theme is “Perpetual Motion,” named after an aerial dance company who will be performing tonight.

  • Some events: Downtown Rogers will be active with opportunities for dance classes and lessons from barre to hip hop to freestyle. The event will also host live art talks and interactive opportunities for the community at local venues.
  • Shows: As a part of a national tour, Perpetual Motion Dance will perform an original show called Y20 at 6p and 7p at Turntable Plaza in the Railyard Park. Stop by before or after a show to see featured artists in Ozark Beer Company, Brick & Mortar, and the ANA Gallery. 

Learn more HERE.
